Texts.Chs: 真棒。你应该会用到^green;大量的高级塑料^reset;，所以请保证储量！接下来，我将帮你获得夜视功能，你看怎么样？
Texts.Eng: Bravo. You'll need ^green;a lot of plastic^reset; so keep stocked! Now let's help you see in the dark, shall we?

Sweet. Now that you have a ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; we can really get working! The first plant you'll probably want to make is the ^orange;Bracken Tree^reset;, as the ^green;Silk^reset; it creates ultimately leads to ^green;Advanced Plastic^reset;. Try making some ^orange;Bracken Tree Seeds^reset; now.
